generalInfo.title: General
generalInfo.description: The name is used to identify the template in URLs and the API.

displayInfo.title: Display
displayInfo.description: A friendly name, description, and icon to help developers identify your template.

schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.description: Define when workspaces created from this template automatically stop.

operations.title: Operations
operations.description: Regulate actions allowed on workspaces created from this template.

parameters.title: Template params
parameters.description: These params are provided by your template's Terraform configuration.

fields.name: Name
fields.allowUsersToCancel: Allow users to cancel in-progress workspace jobs

helperText.defaultTTLHelperText_zero: Workspaces will run until stopped manually.
helperText.defaultTTLHelperText_one: Workspaces will default to stopping after {{count}} hour. If Coder detects workspace connection activity, the autostop timer is bumped by this value.
helperText.defaultTTLHelperText_other: Workspaces will default to stopping after {{count}} hours. If Coder detects workspace connection activity, the autostop timer is bumped by this value.
helperText.maxTTLHelperText_one: Workspaces must stop within 1 hour of starting, regardless of any active connections.
helperText.maxTTLHelperText_other: Workspaces must stop within {{count}} hours of starting, regardless of any active connections.
helperText.allowUsersToCancel: If checked, users may be able to corrupt their workspace.

tooltip.allowUsersToCancel: Depending on your template, canceling builds may leave workspaces in an unhealthy state. This option isn't recommended for most use cases.

error.descriptionMax: Please enter a description that is less than or equal to 128 characters.
error.defaultTTLMax: Please enter a limit that is less than or equal to 720 hours (30 days).
error.defaultTTLMin: Default time until autostop must not be less than 0.
error.maxTTLMax: Please enter a limit that is less than or equal to 720 hours (30 days).
error.maxTTLMin: Maximum time until autostop must not be less than 0.
